name: G-Mode Archives 22: Heracles no Eikou III - Kamigami no Chinmoku
storyline:
Ancient Greece──
It is a time when the heavenly world where the gods live and the human world are not so far apart.
One day, the main character woke up and had lost all his memories until then.
Who am I? Where did you come from? I didn't even remember my name.
Instead, he had a mysterious ability that he would not die no matter what height he fell from.
And the mysterious dreams I often see...
The main character loses his memory just like himself, has an immortal body, meets friends who have the same dream,
Each of them will travel together to find out who they are.
At the same time, there were unprecedented natural ecassms in various parts of the world.
The land that suddenly sinks. Monsters boiling from the hole that leads to the underworld...
As the scale of the abnormality was expanding day by day, something was about to happen to the whole world.
Immortal friends who have lost their memories.
Their past is the key to solving the mystery of natural catastes──.
summary:
"Glory of Heracles" is an RPG based on Greek mythology.
Since the release of the first work "Tojin Makyoden: The Glory of Heracles" in 1987, it is a popular RPG series that has spun stories with a number of hardware, and this work is the best scenario and famous title in the series.

The story is independent of other series works, and you can enjoy it alone.

In a world where day and night change with the passage of time, the people and shops you can meet will change.

While confronting strong enemies while making full use of 7 kinds of characteristic weapons and magic learned in temples in various places, in battles with weak enemies, the characters will fight automatically battle only with striking attacks by switching to auto battle mode, so it's stressful. You can play without it.
